extension.summary: Installer for [COLOR cyan]Looking Glass[/COLOR] Team and Community Builds
extension.description: This Wizard allows you to install the latest version of builds from some members of the [B][COLOR cyan]Looking Glass[/COLOR][/B] Team as well as other builders in the Community. It also provides Maintenance, Tools and Tweaks sections to help you keep your Media Center running as smoothly as possible.
